member.summary: Validates the property.

member.summary: Validates the property.

member.name: M:ADMS.API.Models.DocumentDto.ValidateChecksum
member.summary: Validates the property.

member.name: M:ADMS.API.Models.DocumentDto.MimeTypeRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^[\\w\\.\\-]+\\/[\\w\\.\\-\\+]+$
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match a character in the set [-.\w] atomically at least once.
○ Match '/'.
○ Match a character in the set [+-.\w] atomically at least once.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:ADMS.API.Models.DocumentDto.ChecksumRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^[A-Fa-f0-9]{64}$
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match a character in the set [0-9A-Fa-f] exactly 64 times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.
